MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G71 and G72 postcode areas of Blantyre, Uddingston and Cambuslang. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.05am. Our engineers have arrived on site in the local area and have discovered broken equipment on the overhead line network in the Honeyhill area.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.08am on the 8th of February 2021.
